statements: SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, join_date, retention_status FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_group = 'A';
SELECT customer_id, cohort_group FROM cohort_analysis WHERE retention_status = TRUE ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, cohort_group, retention_status FROM cohort_analysis ORDER BY retention_status DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis ORDER BY join_date DESC, customer_id ASC, cohort_group
SELECT customer_id, cohort_group FROM cohort_analysis WHERE retention_status = TRUE ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, cohort_group FROM cohort_analysis GROUP BY cohort_group ORDER BY total_customers DESC
SELECT cohort_group, join_date, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM cohort_analysis WHERE retention_status = FALSE GROUP BY cohort_group, join_date ORDER BY cohort_group, join_date ASC
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('day', NOW() - join_date)) AS avg_days_since_join, cohort_group FROM cohort_analysis GROUP BY cohort_group ORDER BY avg_days_since_join DESC
SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, cohort_id, sign_up_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE sign_up_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, cohort_id FROM cohort_analysis ORDER BY cohort_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, cohort_id, sign_up_date, cohort_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, cohort_id, sign_up_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, sign_up_date, cohort_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT user_id, retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE retention_period >= 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, AVG(retention_rate) AS avg_retention FROM retention_rates WHERE last_activity_date = '2022-01-05'
SELECT cohort_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM cohort_analysis GROUP BY cohort_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 5 ORDER BY cohort_id DESC
SELECT user_id, cohort_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY cohort_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, country, customer_since FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM retention_rates WHERE retention_rate > 50;
SELECT customer_id, cohort_date, country FROM customers ORDER BY cohort_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, country FROM customers WHERE cohort_date < '2020-01-01' AND customer_since >= '2018-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, country, customer_since FROM customers WHERE country = 'Canada' AND customer_since BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT cohort_date, retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE cohort_date > '2018-01-01' AND retention_rate > 20.00 ORDER BY retention_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cohorts WHERE cohort_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT retention_id, cohort_id, retention_rate FROM retention WHERE retention_rate > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, signup_date, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount >= 100.00;
SELECT * FROM cohorts WHERE cohort_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, signup_date FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT cohort_id, cohort_start_date, cohort_end_date FROM cohorts WHERE cohort_start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY cohort_end_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, signup_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT retention_id, retention_rate FROM retention WHERE cohort_id = 2 AND retention_rate > 70 ORDER BY retention_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT cohort_name, cohort_start_date, cohort_end_date FROM cohorts WHERE cohort_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT retention_id, retention_rate, retention_date FROM retention WHERE retention_rate < 50 ORDER BY retention_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cohorts WHERE cohort_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT cohort_name, cohort_start_date, cohort_end_date FROM cohorts WHERE cohort_name LIKE '%Spring%';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL;
